content: the full pattern is also available on my blog for free here is the link to the youtube playlist 1 for this pattern each video is broken down into 10-row increments for easier viewing this afghan is done in a bright color palette that invokes the thoughts of faeries flitting about the woods bits of sparkle keep it bright and ethereal you can use the colors chosen by me or you can use scraps to make this a one of a kind creation good luck and have fun 1 https //youtube com/playlist list=plg5zdm_rpffahkvbwbt9cqyr5cf4rmly5
